import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProfilePage = ({ user }) => { if (!user) { return (

You must be logged in to view this page.

); } // Format date for display const formatDate = (dateString) => { if (!dateString) return 'Not provided'; return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); }; return (

My Profile

{/* Personal Information Section */}

Personal Information

{user.name || 'Not provided'}

{user.email || 'Not provided'}

{formatDate(user.birth_date)}

{user.is_author ? 'Author' : 'Student'}

{user.is_author && ( Author )}
{/* Address Information Section */}

Address Information

{user.holding || 'Not provided'}

{user.thana || 'Not provided'}

{user.city || 'Not provided'}

{user.district || 'Not provided'}

{user.country || 'Not provided'}

{user.postal_code || 'Not provided'}

{/* Additional Information Section */}

Account Statistics

{user.created_at ? new Date(user.created_at).getFullYear() : 'N/A'}

Profile Status

Active

User ID

{user.person_id || 'N/A'}

); }; export default ProfilePage;
